text:
Hey, @_buildspace fam. 

My Univ. SCU students are working on a project to train robots using LLMs. 

I'm developing a generic API to connect multiple LLMs for optimal performance, seamlessly switching based on response quality, use case, & broader context. 
cc @_nightsweekends https://t.co/10hqblx94y
